content: this pattern is ideal for storing crochet hooks notions and patterns as there is a back pocket provided once you fold it looks like a book make yourself this amazing crochet hook holder in a book-style organizer **please add the pattern to your ravelry favorites for easy reference ** > you can purchase the ad-free printer-friendly pdf here on ravelry this pattern can also be found in my > crochet membership which includes over 200 patterns and 100s of video tutorials you can join the membership on my website 1 1 https //www nickishomemadecrafts com/crochet/the-crochet-club/
